lines.text: I felt like a bimbo in cheap horror film.
I asked you what you were thinking.
You can't be thinking about nothing. Even a retard has something on his mind.
It appears you are no match for the gay blade!
I felt like a bimbo in a slasher movie screaming like that.
Tonight, the stage is mine. I have everything an actor could wish for. A captive audience, a beautiful leading lady, and no critics!
